entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
